original_text: God said good things about all these people because they trusted him. But they still did not receive everything that God had promised to give to them.
korean_text: 이 사람들은 다 믿음으로 말미암아 증거를 받았으나 약속된 것을 받지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: God said good things about all these people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 이 모든 사람들에 대해 좋은 말씀을 하셨고

sentences.original_text: But they still did not receive everything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 여전히 모든 것을 받지 못했고

sentences.original_text: that God had promised to give to them
